title: 75/365/EEC: Council Decision of 16 June 1975 setting up a Committee of Senior Officials on Public Health
header:
COUNCIL DECISION  of 16 June 1975  setting up a Committee of Senior Officials on Public Health  (75/365/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: A Committee of Senior Officials on Public Health, hereinafter called the "committee", shall be set up within the Commission.

1. The committee shall consist of senior officials from the Member States who have direct responsibility in the field of public health.
2. The members of the committee shall be designated by the Member States, each of which shall designate one member and one alternate.
3. The committee shall be chaired by a Commission representative.
The committee shall adopt its rules of procedure.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 16 June 1975.
For the Council
The President
R. RYAN  (1)See page 1 of this Official Journal. (2)See page 14 of this Official Journal.
